content.rendered:
Fall Season Registration & Start Dates:  
Specific tryout dates, times and locations will be posted on the athletics website in August.
  • Monday, August 18: Varsity/JV/Freshman – All Sports Start
  • Thursday, August 28: 7th and 8th, Mod 9 All Sports Start
Athletics Registration Dates:
  • Saturday, July 20,  Arbiter will open for registration and medical clearance for Varsity, Junior Varsity, and Freshman level sports  
  • Wednesday, July 30, Arbiter will open for registration and medical clearance for Modified sports including Modified 7/8 and Mod 9  
Physical Information:
Physicals expire 12 months after the date of the health exam. No athlete will be permitted to play or tryout with an expired physical.  
Physicals will be offered at the High School Nurse’s Office on Friday, 8/8 10 a.m.- noon and Friday, August 15 from 10 a.m. – noon. Please reach out to the nurse at hs_healthoffice@saratogaschools.org to see if your child needs a physical and schedule an appointment.  Click here for a link to the Health Examination Form.
    APP Information
    Athletic Placement Process (APP) Information 
    Fall Sports APP Fitness Test Dates:
    • Tuesday, June 17 and Wednesday, June18 at Maple Ave after school
    • Friday, August 15 from 9:00am- 10:00am at the High School
    • Monday, August 18 from 5:00pm-6:00 pm at the High School
    • Tuesday, August 19 from 5:00pm-6:00pm at the High School
     
    Winter Registration & Start Dates:
    • Monday, November 17 – All High School Sports
    • Monday, November 24– All Modified Sports (Mod 9, 7th or 8th grade)
    • Monday, October 20 – Family ID/Arbiter will open for registration and medical clearance for Varsity, Junior varsity, and Freshman level sports
    • Monday, Oct 27 – Family ID/Arbiter will open for registration and medical clearance for Modified sports including modified 7/8 and mod 9
    Spring Registration & Start PROJECTED Dates:
    • Monday, March 16 – All High School Sports
    • Monday, March 30 – All Modified Sports (Mod 9, 7th or 8th grade)
    • Monday, Feb. 16 – Family ID/Arbiter will open for registration and medical clearance for Varsity, Junior varsity, and Freshman level sports
    • Monday, March 2– Family ID/Arbiter will open for registration medical clearance for Modified sports including modified 7/8 and mod 9
